Name of Quantlet:    'ATSSB_BTC_Explorations'

Published in:        'Applied Time Series Analysis and Forecasting with Python Solutions Book'

Description:         'This Quantlet produces different plots for the Bitcoin Price Time series.'

Keywords:            'time series, bitcoin, viztech'

Author:         Huang Changquan, Alla Petukhina, Raul Cristian Bag
